subject: Re: Graphic Design Work
body:
(emailing you in case you are not subscribed)
Hello there

André, the artwork author for etch is organizing an artwork team.
I don't know what is the state of it, so, i am only welcoming you.

You can chat with desktop members and users at irc.debian.org
#debian-desktop . 

André's nickname is si0ux.

Anyway, if you have proposals, they are all evaluated and (or not)
integrated in debian.

please check http://wiki.debian.org/DebianDesktopArtwork

best regards
Luis Matos
Qua, 2007-04-18 às 15:39 +0100, James Herrington escreveu:
> Hi,
> 
> I am a young graphic/web designer and am looking to gain some high profile 
> experience for my portfolio. I have heard from other debian mailing lists 
> that some graphic design work is currently going into the debian desktop. Is 
> there any suitable work for someone with my experience?
> 
> Regards,
> 
> James 
> 
> 


-- 
To UNSUBSCRIBE, email to debian-desktop-REQUEST@lists.debian.org
with a subject of "unsubscribe". Trouble? Contact listmaster@lists.debian.org
